title: Game Theory: Please Come Home... (Andy's Apple Farm)
author: The Game Theorists
description:
Special thanks to Opera for sponsoring this episode!
Download Opera GX FREE! ► https://operagx.gg/TheGameTheorists
& get complete CONTROL over your Ram & CPU usage!

Get Your Holiday Theory Wear NOW! ► https://creatorink.co/4wj 

Welcome back to the special corner of Game Theory reserved for the cute games that have a deadly darkness hiding just under the surface. Today, we are talking about Andy's Apple Farm. I played this over on GTLive and knew I had to make a theory. There is some creepy stuff hiding in this game. Get your flashlights ready Loyal Theorists, this is about to get DARK!

Find out more about the game HERE! ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1810960/Andys_Apple_Farm/

SUBSCRIBE to Catch all the Theories! ► https://goo.gl/kQWHkJ        

Need Royalty Free Music for your Content? Try Epidemic Sound. 
Get A 30 Day Free Trial! ► http://share.epidemicsound.com/MatPat

#AndysAppleFarm #Creepy #Scary #Lore #ScaryGame #Creepypasta #MatPat #Theory #GameTheory
